channel.title: Well, made it to Sp. Jonin...
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Well, made it to Sp. Jonin..."

item.title: Re: Well, made it to Sp. Jonin...
item.content:encoded:
I waited until I was a Jonin to really do B-Ranks with Emo/Pinky/Billy/Stalkergirl. But I've struggled with range a lot. K-Dog's headband helped, so do Shorty's jutsu (and some legacy jutsu). You can also get a couple of +range allies, like Rover's Mom and Fletch.

Edit:Shikai and Bankai also help.

item.title: Well, made it to Sp. Jonin...
item.content:encoded:
Now what o.O How do you get all the range you need to defeat these things? I know the NWN rewards but…wow… :P

More specificaly I think…I know there are some teams with good range, but…how do you get to them in the first place? I have Ro-Sham-Bo Redux, but I really want to get Crazy Love Triangle. But I have to have them in my party to do it…and without a good team I only have a range of 10 in Genjutsu. How do you push your range up?
